## useDomRect() function

Subscribe to changes of element's `DOMRect`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useDomRect(ref: RefObject<HTMLElement>): DOMRect | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | RefObject&lt;HTMLElement&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

DOMRect \| undefined
